entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 07:25 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
